definition[0]: worse than anything or anyone else
example[0]: This is the worst recession for fifty years.
example[1]: My worst fear was that we would run out of food.
example[2]: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
explanation[0]: The superlative form of bad is worst
example[3]: It was the worst film I have ever seen
bad_example[0]: It was the most worst film I have ever seen
bad_example[1]: It was the worstest film I have ever seen
example[4]: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
example[5]: the worst-dressed man in the office
